name: Behemoth (GGJ2023)
description:
- BEWARE HEADPHONE USERS - (This game is incredibly loud)

Press "B" to change to auomatic settings (use this if the performance is bad)

Pick up the boots and gloves and climb the Root Colossus.

Climb with "E" (only works if you have the gloves and boots)

Fight enemies with "F" or "LMB"

Credits:

Florian Knuth

Julien Geiger

Kevin Ryborz 

Marco Verständig
